subject: Complete Phase 2: Add localStorage persistence for view mode
body:
Add user preference persistence so the selected model selection mode
(Overview/Wizard/Direct) is remembered across sessions.

Changes:
- Add loadSelectionModePreference() to load from localStorage
- Add saveSelectionModePreference() to persist preference
- Initialize selectionMode from localStorage (defaults to 'overview')
- Save preference when mode changes via toggle buttons or navigation

localStorage key: 'model-pear-selection-mode'
Valid values: overview, wizard, direct

Phase 2 (Options Overview) is now complete.
